```{r child_tsne, context="server"}
output$tsne <- renderPlotly({
	gen.path2 <- igenclust2() 
	eid2 <- ieid2() 
	path2 <- ipath2() 
	clust2 <- iclust2()
	color2 <- icolor2() #c("gene,pathway","cluster","efficacy","selectivity"),
	lik2 <- ilik2()

	gs2 <- igs2()

	if(is.null(gen.path2)|
		(gen.path2=="gene"&is.null(eid2))|
		(gen.path2=="pathway"&is.null(path2))|
		(gen.path2=="cluster"&is.null(clust2)))
	return(NULL)

	if(gen.path2=="gene"){
		eids <- eid2
	}else if(gen.path2=="pathway"){
		eids <- gs2
	}else if(gen.path2=="cluster"){
		eids <- mems$eid[mems$mem==clust2]
	}

	if(color2 == "density"){
		mems.1 <- mems %>% arrange(d) %>% mutate(pri=d)
		col <- scale_colour_identity()
	}else if(color2=="efficacy"){
		mems.1 <- mems %>% arrange(desc(efficacy)) %>% mutate(pri=-efficacy)
		col <- scale_colour_gradientn(colours = rev(brewer.pal(11,"Spectral")))
	}else if(color2=="selectivity"){
		mems.1 <- mems %>% arrange(selectivity) %>% mutate(pri=selectivity)
		col <- scale_colour_gradientn(colours = rev(brewer.pal(11,"Spectral")))
	}

	p <- ggplot(data=mems,aes(text=text)) +
	    geom_point(data=(mems.1 %>% filter(!eid %in% eids) %>% filter(lik < lik2)),
	    	aes(x,y),col="grey80",alpha=.5,size=.3) +
	    geom_point(data=(mems.1 %>% filter(!eid %in% eids) %>% filter(lik >= lik2)),
	    	aes(x,y,col=pri),size=.5) +
	    col +
	    geom_point(data=(mems.1 %>% filter(eid %in% eids) %>% filter(lik < lik2)),
	    	aes(x,y),col="grey50",size=1) +
	    geom_point(data=(mems.1 %>% filter(eid %in% eids) %>% filter(lik >= lik2)),
	    	aes(x,y),col="red",size=1) +
		theme_bw() +
	    theme(legend.position="none",
			plot.margin=unit(c(0,0,0,0),"lines"),
			axis.text=element_blank(),
			axis.title=element_blank(),
			plot.title=element_blank(),
			axis.ticks=element_blank())
	ply <- ggplotly(p,tooltip="text")
	ply
})
```
